name: Catchin' Crabs
description:
A game about catching crabs! A game for 1-4 local players where you catch crabs and complete objectives through timed levels.

Currently in active development and out for early access. New builds released every Friday (or sooner).

Current development progress and roadmap can be viewed here

CONTROLS - (As of 0.1.3)

USE / PICKUP / CUT - E / Gamepad West  Button

JUMP - Spacebar / Gamepad South Button

THROW - R / Gamepad Right Bumper

DROP - Q / Gamepad North Button

FOLD - Arrow Keys / Gamepad D-Pad

PAUSE - Esc / Gamepad Start
